text: Darryl Raynard Richardson III (born January 19, 1984) is an American rapper. He is better known as Lil Scrappy. He was born in Atlanta, Georgia. He released his first album Bred 2 Die · Born 2 Live on December 5, 2006. The album featured the single "Money in the Bank". This song was featured in the video game WWE SmackDown vs. Raw 2007. He released his second album Tha Gru$tle on June 26, 2012. He also was featured in the hip hop drama movie Just Another Day where he played the character "Jay". Scrappy appears on the VH1 reality show Love & Hip Hop: Atlanta. He is working on a third studio album which is expected to be released sometime in Spring 2014. == Discography == === Studio albums === Year Album 2006 Bred 2 Die · Born 2 Live 2012 Tha Gru$tle 2014 Reparations ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:African-American musicians Category:Rappers from Atlanta Category:Gangsta rappers
title: Lil Scrappy
